titleStmt.title: The innocent cleared and the guilty made manifest being a reply to a printed paper ... titled, Apostacy of the people called Quakers from the faith once delivered to the saints, subscribed by Francis Houlcroft and Joseph Oddey ... also a testimony of the universal love of God in Jesus Christ ... / by a servant of truth ... Samuel Cater.
titleStmt.author: Cater, Samuel, d. 1711.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
